products.name: Vinyl Crunch
products.description: Vanilla malt ice cream loaded with chocolate-covered pretzel bits and toffee pieces — the perfect mix of sweet and salty hits.

products.name: Swingtime Sundae
products.description: Strawberry cheesecake ice cream with graham cracker crumble and whipped cream ribbons — the perfect dessert date.

products.name: Cherry Bombshell
products.description: Cherry ice cream swirled with cherry cola syrup and chunks of dark chocolate — bold, bubbly, and impossible to ignore.

products.name: Banana Bopper
products.description: Banana ice cream with caramel fudge ribbons and crushed peanut brittle — a split second away from being your favorite.

products.name: T-Bird Toffee
products.description: Coffee toffee ice cream with chocolate-covered almonds and ribbons of mocha fudge — cool, fast, and dangerously smooth.

products.name: Car Hop Crunch
products.description: Butterscotch ice cream with praline pecans and shards of caramel candy — the ultimate “drive-in” delight.

products.name: Zoot Suit Zest
products.description: Lemon custard ice cream with candied ginger bits and a swirl of lemon curd — bright, zippy, and dressed to impress.

products.name: Malt Shop Magic
products.description: Chocolate malt ice cream swirled with peanut butter fudge and malted milk ball crunch — a throwback to after-school hangouts.

products.name: Maple Jitterbug
products.description: Maple ice cream with cinnamon-sugar swirl and walnut toffee — a nutty, warm hug with a pep in its step.

products.name: Jukebox Jive
products.description: Black raspberry ice cream with cheesecake chunks and swirls of vanilla fudge — every bite hits a sweet note.

products.name: Flip-Top Float
products.description: Root beer ice cream with cola ribbons and whipped cream pockets — soda shop magic in frozen form.

products.name: Pineapple Twist-Up
products.description: Pineapple cake ice cream with brown sugar caramel swirl and buttery cake bits — a dessert that flips your day upside down.
